altTitles.ja: ちはやふる plus きみがため

description.en:
Rintsu Nagara is a new first-year member of the Mizusawa High School karuta club. For some reason, Rintsuki is aiming to win the national championship, but after Chihaya and her friends graduate, the Mizusawa Karuta Club has only one A-class player, and she has a difficult time ahead of her.

The story depicts Rinzuki's growth along with her eccentric friend Akino and the other members of the club who are dedicated to playing karuta.

biography.en:
Is a Japanese manga artist most known for her manga Chihaya Furu, published by Kodansha. The series is now adapted into an anime. She debuted in 1992 in Kodansha's Nakayoshi magazine with Taiyou no Romance. Her works later moved to Bessatsu Friend magazine, also published by Kodansha.

In October 2005, Suetsugu was accused of plagiarising Takehiko Inoue's Slam Dunk and Real. Kodansha confirmed many of the allegations and the author herself admitted to some. Due to this, Kodansha ceased publications of all of Suetsugu's work

She later resumed her work on March 2007.
biography.es-la:
Es una artista de manga japonesa más conocida por su manga Chihaya Furu, publicado por Kodansha. La serie se ha adaptado a un anime. Debutó en 1992 en la revista Nakayoshi de Kodansha con Taiyou no Romance. Posteriormente, sus obras se trasladaron a la revista Bessatsu Friend, también publicada por Kodansha.

En octubre de 2005, Suetsugu fue acusada de plagiar Slam Dunk y Real de Takehiko Inoue. Kodansha confirmó muchas de las acusaciones y la propia autora admitió algunas. Debido a esto, Kodansha cesó las publicaciones de toda la obra de Suetsugu.

Posteriormente, retomó su trabajo en marzo de 2007.
